title: Create Campaign
lede: Set up automated calling campaigns with AI agents to reach your target audience.

sections.title: Campaign Configuration
sections.content:
Create outbound calling campaigns with customizable settings and targeting.

Campaign Settings:

  • Name & Description: Identify your campaign
  • Agent Selection: Choose which AI agent handles calls
  • Target Audience: Select contacts, leads, or custom lists
  • Schedule: Set calling times and frequency

sections.title: Dialing Strategy
sections.content:
Configure how your campaign makes calls.

  • Dial Rate: Calls per hour or concurrent calls
  • Retry Logic: Handle busy signals and no-answers
  • Time Zones: Respect caller local time zones
  • Compliance: Honor do-not-call lists
